Package no.marec.api.korona

@NullMarked package no.marec.api.korona
API for KORONA computations.

The KORONA module PluginModule takes as a parameter the implementation of a ModuleComputation. Simple computations using only one ping should extend SinglePingModuleComputation.

The PluginModule contains several example implementations.

  • Class
    Description
    Channel
    A channel in a Ping.
    ModuleComputation
    KORONA module computations that use more than just a single ping.
    Ping
    A ping consisting of Channels.
    PingBuffer
    Buffered pings as needed by ModuleComputation.
    SinglePingModuleComputation
    KORONA module computations that use only a single ping.
